Economic Indicators.NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS: Exports of goods and services (% of GDP)
Economic Indicators.NE.IMP.GNFS.ZS: Imports of goods and services (% of GDP)
Economic Indicators.GC.DOD.TOTL.GD.ZS: General government gross debt (% of GDP)

Education Indicators.SE.ADT.LITR.ZS: Literacy rate for adults (% of the population aged 15 and above)
Education Indicators.SE.ENR.PRIM.FM.ZS: Gender parity in primary school enrollment (female %)
Education Indicators.SE.ADT.LITR.FE.ZS: Literacy rate, adult female (% of females ages 15 and above)
Education Indicators.SE.ADT.LITR.MA.ZS: Literacy rate, adult male (% of males ages 15 and above)

Health Indicators.SH.XPD.CHEX.PC.CD: Current health expenditure per capita (current US$)
Health Indicators.SP.DYN.IMRT.FE.IN: Mortality rate, infant, female (per 1,000 live births)
Health Indicators.SP.DYN.IMRT.MA.IN: Mortality rate, infant, male (per 1,000 live births)
Health Indicators.SP.DYN.TO65.FE.ZS: Survival to age 65, female (% of cohort)
Health Indicators.SP.DYN.TO65.MA.ZS: Survival to age 65, male (% of cohort)
Health Indicators.SH.IMM.MEAS: Immunization rate, measles (% of children under 1 year old)

Social Development Indicators.SI.POV.DDAY: Poverty headcount ratio at national poverty lines (% of population)
Social Development Indicators.SL.UEM.TOTL.FE.ZS: Female unemployment rate (% of total female labor force)
Social Development Indicators.SH.STA.ODFC.RU.ZS: People practicing open defecation, rural (% of rural population)
Social Development Indicators.SH.STA.ODFC.UR.ZS: People practicing open defecation, urban (% of urban population)

Population Indicators.SP.POP.0004.FE.5Y: Population ages 0-4, female (% of female population)
Population Indicators.SP.POP.0004.MA.5Y: Population ages 0-4, male (% of male population)
Population Indicators.SP.POP.65UP.FE.ZS: Population ages 65 and above, female (% of total)
Population Indicators.SP.POP.65UP.MA.ZS: Population ages 65 and above, male (% of total)
Population Indicators.SP.POP.DPND: Age dependency ratio (% of working-age population)
Population Indicators.SP.POP.DPND.OL: Age dependency ratio, old (% of working-age population)
Population Indicators.SP.POP.DPND.YG: Age dependency ratio, young (% of working-age population)

Gender and Fertility Indicators.SP.HOU.FEMA.ZS: Female headed households (% of households with a female head)
Gender and Fertility Indicators.SP.M15.2024.FE.ZS: Women who were first married by age 15 (% of women ages 20-24)
Gender and Fertility Indicators.SP.M18.2024.FE.ZS: Women who were first married by age 18 (% of women ages 20-24)
Gender and Fertility Indicators.SP.MTR.1519.ZS: Teenage mothers (% of women ages 15-19 who have had children or are currently pregnant)
Gender and Fertility Indicators.SP.MTR.1519.Q1.ZS: Teenage pregnancy and motherhood (% of women ages 15-19 who have had children or are currently pregnant): Q1 (lowest)
Gender and Fertility Indicators.SP.MTR.1519.Q5.ZS: Teenage pregnancy and motherhood (% of women ages 15-19 who have had children or are currently pregnant): Q5 (highest)

Technological and Infrastructure Progres.EG.CFT.ACCS.ZS: Access to clean fuels and technologies for cooking (% of population)

Environmental Sustainability Indicators.EG.ELC.RNEW.ZS: Renewable electricity output (% of total electricity output)
Environmental Sustainability Indicators.EG.IMP.CONS.ZS: Energy imports, net (% of energy use)
Environmental Sustainability Indicators.EG.USE.COMM.FO.ZS: Fossil fuel energy consumption (% of total)

Political and Governance Indicators.SG.VAW.1549.ZS: Proportion of women subjected to physical and/or sexual violence in the last 12 months (% of women age 15-49)

Employment and Time Use Indicators.SL.AGR.EMPL.FE.ZS: Employment in agriculture, female (% of female employment) (modeled ILO estimate)
Employment and Time Use Indicators.SL.AGR.EMPL.MA.ZS: Employment in agriculture, male (% of male employment) (modeled ILO estimate)
Employment and Time Use Indicators.SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS: Unemployment rate (% of total labor force)

Business Indicators.IC.REG.DURS: Time required to start a business (days)
